examples.example: 我们公司的产品在国际市场上找到了新的出口，发展前景十分广阔。

translate.english: The products of our company have found new exports in the international market, and the development prospects are very broad.

examples.example: 中国的制造业不断发展，为全球提供了更多优质商品的出口。

translate.english: China's manufacturing industry keeps developing and provides more high-quality goods for export to the whole world.

examples.example: 我国的科技产品找到了新的出口，在国际上获得了广泛认可。

translate.english: The scientific and technological products of our country have found new exports and have gained wide recognition internationally.
